text: The 2002 Belgian Cup Final, took place on 9 May 2002 between Club Brugge and Mouscron. It was the 47th Belgian Cup final and was won by Club Brugge. ==Route to the final== {| width="100%" style="text-align:center" |- style="vertical-align:top; background:#9cf;" !colspan=3 style="width:1*"|Club Brugge ! !colspan=3 style="width:1*"|Mouscron |- style="vertical-align:top;
